programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.desc: Phoenix, Arizona wasn't supposed to be the city we know in present day. Before Area 51, hidden deep in the desert, the military discovered a hidden gem that helped them cover up the UFO wave of 1947. Roswell was not the only event that took place. Arizona was home to three major UFO events that the public hardly knows about. These events helped create Project Bluebook.

programme.title: Paranormal Contact
programme.sub-title: Grey Lady of Stoney Beach Part 2
programme.desc: Jeff DeEll, Adam Myles, and Kelly Klassen explore haunted locations along Canada’s east coast, seeking contact with the dead and uncovering the hidden stories that linger in the shadows. Guided by intuition, research, and firsthand encounters, they venture deep into the unknown to give a voice to the spirits still waiting to be heard.

programme.title: Unveiled
programme.desc: Embark on an enthralling journey with "Unveiled," a captivating TV series exploring the enigmatic world of aliens, UFOs, conspiracy theories, and extraterrestrial history. Each episode unveils astonishing encounters, hidden truths, and thought-provoking revelations that challenge reality itself. Discover a thrilling blend of scientific exploration, historical analysis, and captivating storytelling as "Unveiled" pushes the boundaries of human understanding and leaves audiences captivated by the mysteries of the universe.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly visit one of the oldest courthouses and jails in North America as they investigate reports of a hooded specter and the possible spirit of an executed RAF Serviceman at the location.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 6
programme.desc: The supernatural is referred to as phenomena or entities that are not subject to the laws of nature. This documentary examines the history and practices associated with the Supernatural.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Richard meets the owners of an abnormal humanoid skull allegedly discovered in Mexico in the 1930s and a researcher who has had the skull subjected to numerous tests including carbon-14 dating, and DNA in order to determine its origin. Is it the skull of a badly deformed child? Is it a hoax? Is it the remains of an extraterrestrial? Is it a human-alien hybrid? The caretaker of the skull, an expert in facial reconstruction, and a skeptic offer their perspectives on this most unusual relic.

programme.sub-title: Beyond the Veil: Zoo's Ghostly Enigma
programme.desc: In the heart of Clarke Zoo, paranormal activity reigns. We journey deeper, uncovering spine-tingling apparitions and ghostly revelations.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly visit one of the oldest courthouses and jails in North America as they investigate reports of a hooded specter and the possible spirit of an executed RAF Serviceman at the location.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate reports of paranormal activity at a private residence in Quinan, Nova Scotia where the home owners now fear living in their own house.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate the Fairmont Algonquin Resort to try and contact the ghost of a jilted bride in room 473.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Have you ever eaten with the dead? Paul and Holly investigate a restaurant which may be haunted by the ghosts of a former funeral home. The location has an impressive history with ties to the popular Titanic and Halifax Explosion stories.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate a historic French fortress that witnessed two of the largest land and sea battles in North America. The fort may be haunted by the ghosts of its former inhabitants.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly join a group of investigators from the UK. The White Hart Hotel is reported to be haunted by demonic activity while others have reported seeing the ghost of a playful little boy.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate a 12th century property near the historic village of Shocklach, England. Reports from this location include time portals, full bodied apparitions, light and sound anomalies.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly visit a historic Inn while staying in Congleton, England. The ghost of a past owner may still haunt the cellar of the centuries old site.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate a popular and potentially haunted Manchester radio station and then spend the evening at a 10,000 year old burial site near Congleton, England where a ghostly Druid monk has been reportedly seen.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate the quintessential haunted mansion; it’s a century old private Inn that may still possess the spirit of its influential owner and his troubled niece.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: The Waverly Inn is a proud and historic Inn located in Halifax, Nova Scotia. Some guests have reportedly sensed the ghost of Oscar Wilde who visited in the late 1800’s.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate a 12th century property near the historic village of Shocklach, England. Reports from this location include time portals, full bodied apparitions, light and sound anomalies.

programme.title: Classic Canadian Sasquatch Stories
programme.desc: From peeking through windows at hapless farmwives to hurling boulders at Chehalis fishermen, the legendary wildman of British Columbia’s lower Fraser Valley regularly made its presence known to the residents of the Agassiz-Harrison Valley throughout the 1920s, ‘30s, and ‘40s.

programme.title: Trails to the Unknown: A Paranormal Road Trip
programme.desc: Trails to the Unknown: A Paranormal Road Trip follows three paranormal explorers investigating some of the creepiest locations in the United States...ALONE. As the adventure of the day shifts to night, what supernatural beings will they find?

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 7
programme.desc: This documentary explores the idea of transformation and how different cultures have interpreted the concept throughout time. Take a look into something truly transformational in Avatars Of The Astral Worlds: Transformation.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Richard investigates Canada's best-known mysteries, the Oak Island treasure. Also known as the money pit, the site has become one of the world's deepest and most costly archaeological digs. Richard meets with several experts and researchers to discuss rumors that this deep shaft contains pirate plunderer perhaps the lost treasure of The Knights Templar. A skeptic born and raised in the area asserts the ‘money pit' is nothing more than a natural occurring sink hole.

programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.sub-title: Aliens Uncovered: Buried Cities and Lost Tribes Part 1
programme.desc: Hidden in the Grand Canyon, in the areas that are off limits to modern civilization, is a group of ancestors that have become lost over time. With the help of a Hopi Elder, we uncovered this lost group and discover an ancient connection.
